description: This file defines a React functional component called EmptyState, which presents a standardized UI element for displaying an empty state message with optional actions.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title = "Nothing to show", description = "There is currently no data available.", actionLabel, to, onAction, ariaLabel = "Empty state", })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a styled section with a title, description, and optional action button or link.
